Package renderer

Class RenderBatch

java.lang.Object
renderer.RenderBatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<RenderBatch>
public class RenderBatch extends Object implements Comparable<RenderBatch>
This class renders by batch for improved frame rates

  • Constructor Details

    • RenderBatch

      public RenderBatch(int maxBatchSize, int zIndex)
      Constructor declaring batch size and z-index for the batch
      Parameters:
      maxBatchSize - the max size of the batch
      zIndex - the layer order to render the batch

  • Method Details

    • hasRoomForSprites

      public boolean hasRoomForSprites()
      Get if there's room for more sprites
      Returns:
      true if there's room for more sprites, or false

    • hasRoomForTextures

      Returns:
      true if the list contains the texture, or false

    • loadVertexProperties

      private void loadVertexProperties(int spriteRendererIndex)
      Load properties of given spriteRenderer into vertex array
      Parameters:
      spriteRendererIndex - the index of the spriteRenderer you want to pair to the vertex array

    • generateIndices

      private int[] generateIndices()
      Generates the indices for rendering quads. Each quad is made up of 2 triangles, requiring 6 indices.
      Returns:
      An array of indices for the quads.

    • loadElementIndices

      private void loadElementIndices(int[] elements, int index)
      Loads the element indices for a specific quad into the elements array.
      Parameters:
      elements - The array to load the indices into.
      index - The index of the quad.
